dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "Be still, my beating heart... it's..."
dialogueTree.text: Be still, my beating heart... it's amphetamine, sweet amphetamine!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant isn't studying the p..."
links.text: The lieutenant isn't studying the powder in the mirror. He's studying you.

links.title: Rhetoric: "There's a good vague way to ask whe..."
links.text: There's a good vague way to ask where he stands on drug use. Professionally, I mean.

links.title: You: ""Someone has taken narcotics here...."
links.text: "Someone has taken narcotics here. Perhaps the police should interfere?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps not?" He looks at you. "Th..."
links.text: "Perhaps not?" He looks at you. "This is below our pay grade, detective. However..." He points to the ladder in the corner.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But that there was an interesting..."
links.text: "But that there was an interesting find -- an alternative path into the harbour that the kid uses. Well done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""See that *ladder* there? It's prob..."
links.text: "See that *ladder* there? It's probably another way into the industrial harbour, no? A secret path the local kids use."

links.title: You: ""I wasn't thinking about taking it,..."
links.text: "I wasn't thinking about taking it, I swear! I was thinking about *justice*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course, detective. *Swift* just..."
links.text: "Of course, detective. *Swift* justice. Don't worry, we don't have to investigate every trace of narcotics..." The lieutenant points to the ladder in the corner.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, swift, lightning justice! Fas..."
links.text: Yeah, swift, lightning justice! Faster... Harder... Justicer!

links.title: You: ""I've heard amphetamines make you a..."
links.text: "I've heard amphetamines make you a really good detective. Are *you* a... really good detective?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I'm just a *regular* detective..."
links.text: "No, I'm just a *regular* detective. Thank you very much."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You run your tongue across the plat..."
links.text: You run your tongue across the plate four or five times. Like a dog. Still, just a very faint, bitter taste. This isn't enough to get a big man anywhere.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yes, there isn't enough anyway. You..."
links.text: Yes, there isn't enough anyway. You'd only be *fooling* yourself.

links.title: You: "Lick it, but only a little. An itty..."
links.text: Lick it, but only a little. An itty-bitty little lick.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Responsible drug use. Just a faint..."
links.text: Responsible drug use. Just a faint bitter taste on the tip of your tongue. There wasn't enough to get a grown man anywhere.
